name: Dungeoncrawler (Hoeleboele)
description:
This is an rogue like dungeon crawler. You move in a dungeon and must get to the end square somewhere in the dungeon. When you get there you can choose an upgrade or money. After this the enemies get a bit stronger to but watch out because they can scale nearly infinite.

With money you can unlock more characters while an upgrade can get you further. The later you get the money the more you get.

Future plan is to make the multiplayer work it is currently dissabled because of alot of desynchronization between players they die or take wounds.
